attributes.action: Eastway eastfield scarborough needs traffic calming measures to stop speeding motorists and to protect our children!
attributes.additional_details: Eastway eastfield scarborough needs traffic calming measures to protect the local community one child has already been killed on this road. Children cross to go to school, shops and cross to go to a popular park area something needs doing asap before more children even adults are killed!

rejection.details: This would be for the local authority.
